welcome.welcome_message: Your friendly multichain wallet to explore blockchain
welcome.description: Choose how you want to set up your wallet

forgot_pass.title: Forgot password
forgot_pass.paragraph_1: Kuma does not keep a copy of your password. If you’re having trouble unlocking your account, you will need to reset your wallet.
forgot_pass.paragraph_2: This action will delete your current wallet and Secret Recovery Phrase from this device, along with the list of accounts you’ve curated. After resetting with a Secret Recovery Phrase, you’ll see a list of accounts based on the Secret Recovery Phrase you use to reset. This new list will automatically include accounts that have a balance.
forgot_pass.paragraph_3: If you have any doubts you can find more information on our

account_form.create_password_description: Enter your password to create a seed for your recovery phrase.
account_form.recovery_phrase_description:
Your secret recovery phrase is used to recover your crypto. 

Save these 12 words in a secure location, such as a password manager, and never share them with anyone.
account_form.confirm_recovery_phrase_description: Verify that you saved your secret recovery phrase by completing the missing words in the right order.
account_form.import_account_description: Choose your preferred way to import an account.
account_form.import_account_warning: Please note that substrate based accounts only can be imported from seed phrases.
account_form.import_from_private_key_description: Enter your private key to import an existing wallett.
account_form.password_requirements: The password must contain at least eight characters, at least one number, both lower and uppercase letters and special characters.
account_form.password_requirements_error: the password does not meet the requirements
account_form.create_with_new_seed_phrase: Create with a new seed phrase
account_form.derive_description: Choose an account to derive from

account.title: Account detail
account.delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
account.private_alert: Please note that anyone with your seed phrase can steal assets from your account

chain_selector.create_or_import_warning: This network only support {{supported_type}} accounts, please create or import a supported account.
chain_selector.network_change_warning: The selected account will be changed because the network to which you want to change does not support the current account type. Are you sure you want to change the network?
chain_selector.title: Networks
chain_selector.description: Enable networks you wish to visualize your assets on

confirm_trusted_site.title: Action Required
confirm_trusted_site.new_site_warning: This site wants to connect to your Kuma Wallet. Please review the site's information and make sure you trust it before connecting.
confirm_trusted_site.site_will_be_trusted: By confirming this site will be trusted in the future.
confirm_trusted_site.manage_trusted_sites: If you want to manage the trusted sites go to Settings > Security.

security.title: Security
security.account_keys_description: Warning: Keep this password confidential. Sharing your private keys could lead to theft of assets from your account.
security.reset_wallet_warning: Warning: This action will delete all your accounts and data from the extension. All your assets are safe as they are NOT stored on the extension. You will need to restore your accounts using the seed phrase.

buy.info: You are now leaving Kuma Wallet for Transak. By proceeding and procuring services from Transak, you acknowledge that you have read and agreed to Transak's <term/> and <policy/> . For any question related to Transak's services please visit <support/> site.

send.contract_error: An error occurred with the contract

re_enter_password.title: Re-enter password
re_enter_password.re_enter_password_text: Please re-enter your password to confirm this action.

bug_report.title: Bug report
bug_report.collaborate_description: Kuma Wallet is an open source project. If you want to collaborate with us, please visit our GitHub repository. You can follow the instructions on how to submit a pull request at the README.md file.
bug_report.report_an_issue_description: If you want to report an issue, please visit our Discord channel and follow the instructions on how to submit a bug report.

swap.title: Swap
swap.stealthex_swap_message: After proceed you will have to transfer to an address provided by StealthEX. The transaction will be processed automatically and you will receive your tokens in your recipient address.
swap.tx_confirm_info_message: You will have to transfer to {{address_to_transfer}} provided by Stealthex protocol, then you will receive {{receive_amount}} {{receive_asset}} in the address you provided: {{address_to_receive}}
swap.swap_not_enough_balance: The amount is too low for the minimum limit allowed for the trade
swap.asset_not_allowed: The asset is not available for trading
swap.not_enough_liquidity: The pool does not have sufficient liquidity to carry out the operation.
swap.info_swap_hydradx: The quote has expired. Please request a new quote.

change_password.title: Change your password
change_password.password_tip: Use letters, numbers and characters to add extra security.
